channel.title: WordPress Plugin on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in WordPress Plugin on Damien Saunders

item.title: DBC Backup 2 gets a significant re-write to support mysqli connector
item.description: DBC Backup 2 has just undergone a major update to use mysqli connector. This is a significant change as the PHP mysql connector has been flagged for removal since PHP v5. For the first time the plugin will introduce a download function - allow a logged in admin user to download the backup file. The new version is slated for release in the next week and is currently in stability testing.
